00029 #import "GHUITableViewStatusDelegate.h"
00030 
00031 #import "GHUITableViewCell.h"
00032 
00033 @implementation GHUITableViewStatusDelegate
00034 
00035 - (id)initWithStatusView:(UIView<GHUITableViewStatusView> *)statusView {
00036   if ((self = [super init])) {
00037     statusView_ = [statusView retain];
00038     statusCell_ = [[GHUITableViewCell alloc] initWithView:statusView_ reuseIdentifier:nil];
00039     statusCell_.selectionStyle = UITableViewCellSelectionStyleNone;
00040   }
00041   return self;
00042 }
00043 
00044 - (void)dealloc {
00045   [statusView_ release];
00046   [statusCell_ release];
00047   [super dealloc];
00048 }
00049 
00050 - (void)setMessage:(NSString *)message {
00051   [statusView_ setText:message];
00052 }
00053 
00054 - (NSString *)message {
00055   return [statusView_ text];
00056 }
00057 
00058 - (void)setLoading:(BOOL)loading {
00059   [statusView_ setLoading:loading];
00060 }
00061 
00062 - (BOOL)isLoading {
00063   return [statusView_ isLoading];
00064 }
00065 
00066 #pragma mark Delegates (UITableView)
00067 
00068 - (CGFloat)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView heightForRowAtIndexPath:(NSIndexPath *)indexPath {
00069   // Do not return 0 here, will freeze the app
00070   if (tableView.frame.size.height > 0) return tableView.frame.size.height;
00071   return 460.0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 - (NSInteger)numberOfSectionsInTableView:(UITableView *)tableView {
00075   return 1;
00076 }
00077 
00078 - (NSInteger)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView numberOfRowsInSection:(NSInteger)section {
00079   return 1;
00080 }
00081 
00082 - (UITableViewCell *)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView cellForRowAtIndexPath:(NSIndexPath *)indexPath {    
00083   return statusCell_;
00084 }
00085 
00086 - (void)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView didSelectRowAtIndexPath:(NSIndexPath *)indexPath { }
00087 
00088 @end
00089 
00090 
00091 @implementation GHUITableViewStatusView
00092 
00093 @synthesize loading=loading_, text=text_;
00094 
00095 - (id)init {
00096   if ((self = [super initWithFrame:CGRectZero])) {
00097     label_ = [[UILabel alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectZero];
00098     label_.font = [UIFont systemFontOfSize:16.0];
00099     label_.textColor = [UIColor colorWithRed:0.475 green:0.475 blue:0.475 alpha:1.0];
00100     label_.textAlignment = UITextAlignmentLeft;
00101     label_.text = text_;
00102     [self addSubview:label_];
00103     [label_ release];
00104     
00105     loadingIndicator_ = [[UIActivityIndicatorView alloc] initWithActivityIndicatorStyle:UIActivityIndicatorViewStyleGray];
00106     loadingIndicator_.hidden = YES;
00107     [self addSubview:loadingIndicator_];
00108     [loadingIndicator_ release];
00109     
00110     self.text = @"Loading...";
00111   }
00112   return self;
00113 }
00114 
00115 - (void)layoutSubviews {  
00116   CGSize size = self.frame.size;
00117 
00118   CGSize labelFitSize = [label_ sizeThatFits:CGSizeMake(320, 20)];
00119 
00120   // Center text on view (according to preferred size); Leave room for loading indicator.
00121   CGFloat x = size.width / 2.0 - labelFitSize.width / 2.0;
00122   CGFloat y = size.height / 2.0 - labelFitSize.height / 2.0;  
00123   
00124   label_.frame = CGRectMake(x + 10, y, labelFitSize.width, labelFitSize.height);  
00125   loadingIndicator_.frame = CGRectMake(x - 15, y, 20, 20);
00126 }
00127 
00128 - (void)startAnimating {
00129   loadingIndicator_.hidden = NO;
00130   [loadingIndicator_ startAnimating];
00131 }
00132 
00133 - (void)stopAnimating {
00134   [loadingIndicator_ stopAnimating];  
00135   loadingIndicator_.hidden = YES;
00136 }
00137 
00138 - (void)setLoading:(BOOL)loading {
00139   loading_ = loading;
00140   if (loading_) {
00141     label_.text = text_;
00142     [self startAnimating];
00143   } else {
00144     label_.text = nil;
00145     [self stopAnimating];
00146   }
00147   [self setNeedsLayout];
00148 }
00149 
00150 - (void)setText:(NSString *)text {
00151   [text retain];
00152   [text_ release];
00153   text_ = text;
00154   label_.text = text;
00155   [self setNeedsLayout];
00156 }
00157 
00158 @end
